00042 #define ZFS_UPDATED_BLOCK_SIZE ZFS_MAXDATA
00043 
00045 #define ZFS_MODIFIED_BLOCK_SIZE 1024
00046 
00059 #define UPDATE_P(DENTRY, ATTR)                                             \
00060   (!((DENTRY)->fh->meta.flags & METADATA_COMPLETE)                         \
00061    || ((DENTRY)->fh->attr.type == FT_DIR                                   \
00062        ? (ATTR).version > (DENTRY)->fh->meta.master_version                \
00063        : (((DENTRY)->fh->attr.version == (DENTRY)->fh->meta.master_version \
00064            && (ATTR).version > (DENTRY)->fh->meta.master_version))))
00065 
00078 #define REINTEGRATE_P(DENTRY, ATTR)                                     \
00079   ((DENTRY)->fh->attr.type == FT_DIR                                    \
00080    ? (DENTRY)->fh->attr.version > (DENTRY)->fh->meta.master_version     \
00081    : ((ATTR).version == (DENTRY)->fh->meta.master_version               \
00082       && (DENTRY)->fh->attr.version > (DENTRY)->fh->meta.master_version))
00083 
00085 #define METADATA_SIZE_CHANGE_P(ATTR1, ATTR2)                    \
00086         (((ATTR1).type == FT_REG) && ((ATTR1).size != (ATTR2).size))
00087 
00089 #define METADATA_MASTER_VERSION_CHANGE_P(DENTRY, ATTR)                        \
00090         (((ATTR).type == FT_REG) && ((DENTRY)->fh->meta.master_version != (ATTR).version))
00091 
00093 #define METADATA_ATTR_CHANGE_P(META, ATTR)                              \
00094   ((ATTR).mode != GET_MODETYPE_MODE ((META).modetype)                   \
00095    || (ATTR).uid != (META).uid                                          \
00096    || (ATTR).gid != (META).gid)
00097 
00099 #define METADATA_CHANGE_P(DENTRY, ATTR)                                 \
00100   (METADATA_ATTR_CHANGE_P ((DENTRY)->fh->meta, (DENTRY)->fh->attr)      \
00101    || METADATA_ATTR_CHANGE_P ((DENTRY)->fh->meta, ATTR)                 \
00102    || METADATA_SIZE_CHANGE_P ((DENTRY)->fh->attr, ATTR)                 \
00103    || METADATA_MASTER_VERSION_CHANGE_P(DENTRY, ATTR))
00104 
00106 #define METADATA_ATTR_EQ_P(ATTR1, ATTR2)                                \
00107   ((ATTR1).mode == (ATTR2).mode                                         \
00108    && (ATTR1).uid == (ATTR2).uid                                        \
00109    && (ATTR1).gid == (ATTR2).gid                                        \
00110    && !METADATA_SIZE_CHANGE_P(ATTR1, ATTR2))
00111
